entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening except west 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
